{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R9000 |revision=-100NAS
(Nighthawk X10) |series=AD7200 |asin=B01M12RE4A |est_release_date=09/29/2016 |fcc_date=09/23/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY316200339,PPD-QCA9008-SBD1,PY317400405, |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL-514 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML04G200TFI00 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP+ |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1 |wi2_module_if=NGFF (M.2 1216) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9500 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=ad |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=QCA8337N |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=6 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 2-port USB 3.0 PCIe Controller;ASMedia;ASM1024A;;1; ,,, 1x2 PCIe Packet Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, 256QAM, DFS, WiGig, LACP, SFP+ (10GbE), |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=[https://www.voxel-firmware.com/Downloads/Voxel/html/browse.html Voxel] |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ad |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=B0:B9:8A |oui_eth=B0:B9:8A }}
:• '''4620''' Mbps - 1-stream 802.11ad device (MCS12/16-QAM (3/4)), :• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''7200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X10 - AD7200 Smart WiFi Router}} :''802.11ac Quad-Stream Wave2 Wi-Fi plus 802.11ad'' :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R9000.aspx#tab-techspecs}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R9000}} {{FCC ST|03/21/2017|indexme.}} {{see also|Netgear R8900|Netgear|Annapurna Labs}} *A new FCC entry (PY317400405) suggests that Netgear has removed the :Bluetooth circuitry and antenna in more recently manufactured devices. :See the [https://fccid.io/PY317400405/Letter/Expedited-Review-Letter-3771555 Expedited Review letter]. ===Product features=== *X10 is industry’s fasted router for media streaming with Plex media server. *X10 with 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology delivers ultra-smooth 4K streaming, :VR gaming and instant downloads. *With a powerful 1.7GHz Quad-core processor, 60GHz 11ad, Quad-stream :architecture, you can enjoy combined wireless speeds of up to 7.2Gbps. *MU-MIMO supports simultaneous streaming, while 160MHz doubles :WiFi speeds to mobile devices. *Four patent pending external active antennas amplify Wi-Fi signals :to maximize range and throughput. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine [https://community.arm.com/processors/b/blog/posts/synology-s-ds2015xs-brings-arm-to-high-performance-nas-units AL-514] @1.7GHz :Quad Core ARM Cortex-A15 (see also AL5140) *Memory: 512MB Flash (NAND) and 1GB RAM (DDR3) *Tri-Band: 60GHz (4600Mbps), 5GHz (1733Mbps), 2.4GHz (800Mbps) :Supports 4x high-performance active antennas (like R8500) *WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[RFMD]] ([[Qorvo]]) RFPA5542 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*60GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9500 1x1 (AD4600) ::- [[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] module *Seven (7x GbE) 10/100/1000 Mbps ports: 1x WAN & 6x LAN :LACP - Dual Gigabit Ethernet Port Aggregation (LAN1+LAN2) :*Switch: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337N (4x GbE) *Ports: 2x USB 3.0, 1x SFP+ LAN 10GbE (10Gbps) port *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::1680 g]] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33046-netgear-r9000-nighthawk-x10-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''Netgear R9000 Nighthawk X10 Smart WiFi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL314 (?) @1.7GHz (Quad-core ARM Cortex-A15) :''ASMedia'' ASM1182e 1x2 PCIe packet switch, QCA Bluetooth LE radio, :''ASMedia'' ASM1024A 2 port USB 3.0 PCIe controller *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/netgear-nighthawk-x10-review ''Netgear Nighthawk X10 review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-nighthawk-x10-ad7200-smart-wifi-router-r9000.34897/ ''Netgear R9000'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1500-netgear-r9000-nighthawk-x10/ ''Netgear R9000'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] ==Images== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/197-netgear-r9000-nighthawk-x10/ ''Netgear R9000 photo gallery'' on '''OpenITforum'''] [[File:Netgear Nighthawk X10.gif]] __NOTOC__
